result.execSummary:
The defendant Brittany Jean Voltz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Escape-Criminal Arrest, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.42(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Monroe County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: **10/7/2015 - JOC amended to reflect Defendant entitled to 22 days sentence credit on her imposed and stayed sentence and is not to be applied to her conditional jail time.

miscConds.notes: Obtain/maintain employment in an occupation approved by agent and shall not voluntarily quit her employment without agent approval.

No consumption or possession of alcoholic beverages. No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores.

No consumption or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription in own name and take exactly as directed to be taken.

No possession of drug paraphernalia.

No association with known drug dealers, known drug users or their residences.

Not be present where controlled substances are used or illegally sold.

Completely sever all ties with drug subculture.

Obtain housing that meets with agent's approval.

Defendant to undergo AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended.

Defendant to submit a DNA sample if not previously submitted.  Not ordered to pay DNA surcharge.

Defendant to pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

timeConds.notes: At sole discretion of Sheriff's Department in Vernon County, may participate in jail inmate worker program.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brittany Jean Voltz
